00053             function                __construct()
00054             {
00055                   try
00056                   {
00057                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00058                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package_object( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                   }
00061                   catch( Exception $e )
00062                   {
00063                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00064                   }

00093             function                process_component_button( $Str , $Changed )
00094             {
00095                   try
00096                   {
00097                         $Rules = array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00098                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'component_button' , $Rules ) ; )
00099                         {
00100                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00101                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'label' , 'label' );
00102                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'size' , '42' );
00103                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00104                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'component_button.tpl' );
00105                               $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
00106                               
00107                               $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00108                               $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00109                               $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00110                               $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
00111                               $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
00112                               
00113                               $Str = str_replace( "{component_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00114                               $Changed = true;
00115                         }
00116                         
00117                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }
00124             
00151             function                process_menu_button( $Str , $Changed )
00152             {
00153                   try
00154                   {
00155                         $Rules = array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00156                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'menu_button' , $Rules ) ; )
00157                         {
00158                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00159                               
00160                               $Label = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'label' , 'label' );
00161                               $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
00162                               $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' , 'last' );
00163                               $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00164                               $Size = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'size' , 24 );
00165                               
00166                               $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00167                               
00168                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/menu_button.tpl' );
00169                               
00170                               $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
00171                               $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
00172                               $Template = str_replace( '{label}' , $Label , $Template );
00173                               $Template = str_replace( '{size}' , $Size , $Template );
00174                               $Template = str_replace( '{package_version}' , $PackageVersion , $Template );
00175                               
00176                               $Str = str_replace( "{menu_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00177 
00178                               $Changed = true;
00179                         }
00180                         
00181                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00182                   }

00215             function                process_toolbar_button( $Str , $Changed )
00216             {
00217                   try
00218                   {
00219                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'toolbar_button' , array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00220                         {
00221                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00222                               
00223                               $Title = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , '' );
00224                               $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
00225                               $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00226                               $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00227                               $Size = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'size' , 32 );
00228                               $Permit = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'permit' , 'admin' );
00229                               
00230                               $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00231                               
00232                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'toolbar_button.tpl' );
00233                               
00234                               $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
00235                               $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
00236                               $Template = str_replace( '{title}' , $Title , $Template );
00237                               $Template = str_replace( '{size}' , $Size , $Template );
00238                               $Template = str_replace( '{package_version}' , $PackageVersion , $Template );
00239                               $Template = str_replace( '{permit}' , $Permit , $Template );
00240                               
00241                               $Str = str_replace( "{toolbar_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00242 
00243                               $Changed = true;
00244                         }

00247                   }

00284             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00285             {
00286                   try
00287                   {
00288                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_component_button( $Str , $Changed );
00289                         
00290                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_menu_button( $Str , $Changed );
00291                         
00292                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_toolbar_button( $Str , $Changed );
00293                         
00294                         return( $Str );
00295                   }
00296                   catch( Exception $e )
00297                   {
00298                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00299                   }
00300             }
